articles.title: Pervez Musharraf, Former Pakistani Leader, Sentenced to Death
articles.description: The Pakistani court’s sentence is unlikely to be carried out because Mr. Musharraf is no longer in the country.
articles.content: The treason case was initiated in 2013 by the government of Nawaz Sharif, a former prime minister who has a history of animosity toward the former military ruler. Mr. Musharraf toppled Mr. Sharifs government in 1999 in a bloodless coup and ruled until 2008. … [+1035 chars]
